title: What is this "summoner spell"??
body:
{{summoner:9}} 
"game_spell_description_SummonerFXTest"

You can get this from "Insert a Summoner Spell icon".

I am curious to know what this is Riot, new game mode or new Summoner's?

replies.body: FXTest would be assumed they just assign various visual effects to it to test out different things most likely on the PTR and it just got carried over to live.

"SummonerFXTest"
Probably just a test for FX, meant effects, I believe. They probably just change its visuals to test visuals.
i noticed it when searching the latest Riot api. still no idea what it is. maybe something for a new gamemode?
it would be a test icon...or is it actually in the game somewhere? im not sure where you got it unless just from the icons in the bottom of the text box...{{summoner:9}}
I just made this thread as I found this icon hanging at the bottom of the "Insert a Summoner Spell icon" box. Didn't find it inside the game.
